dct_description_sm: Gravé par Erhard Fres. 35 bis. Rue Denfert-Rochereau Paris ; Imp. Erhard Fres.
Verso includes various statistical, trade, communications, and historical information on various African countries, with 6 ancillary maps.
Shows possessions and protectorates by colonial powers, railroads, land routes, water ways, marshland, region names, islands, towns.
June 1890 latest year mentioned--but Fort Salisbury is not present on map, and British central Africa does not extend to Lake Nyasa.
